I'll be happy to debug some more if you want me to.

Actually, can you tell me what the indexerId is that is being passed in?

(In reply to comment #2)
> Actually, can you tell me what the indexerId is that is being passed in?

ETA on reply ca. a week.

(In reply to comment #2)
> Actually, can you tell me what the indexerId is that is being passed in?
> 

indexerId= org.eclipse.cdt.core.originalsourceindexer
Ah, that's the old 2.x indexer. I'll make sure I handle this case. Thanks.
If I run into an indexer ID that isn't in the extension point registry, I now default to the Null Indexer.
